question:
[Oliver] was so happy for his brother, [Brian], getting a promotion. [Chris] wanted to join the theater group his sister [Beverly] was a part of. [Beverly]'s mother, [Florence], signed him up for the group. [Florence] went to her brother [Kent]'s birthday party [Oliver] has a few children, [Kent], Bradley and Claire [Norman] 'son, [Chris], aced his math class and made his father proud.
Question: How is [Brian] related to [Norman]?

Step 3: Identify any indirect relationships mentioned in the story
- [Brian] is the uncle of [Kent], Bradley, and Claire
- [Florence] is the aunt of [Kent], Bradley, and Claire
- [Kent] is the uncle of [Norman]
- [Bradley] and [Claire] are cousins of [Norman]

Step 4: Determine the relationship between [Brian] and [Norman]
- Since [Brian] is the brother of [Oliver], and [Oliver] is the father of [Kent], Bradley, and Claire, this means that [Brian] is the uncle of [Kent], Bradley, and Claire.
- Since [Kent] is the father of [Norman], this means that [Brian] is the great-uncle of [Norman].

Step 5: Summarize the relationship between [Brian] and [Norman]
- Based on the information provided, [Brian] is the great-uncle of [Norman].
